> <OLD>

> "They arent comming yet... What we think is Rodimus is missing, as well as

> "That isnt a big miss"said sarcatically Perceptor "dont worry about them"

<NEW>

LORD ELDER leaned back in his chair sighing. "And so now what do we do
about these different problems?" He folded his hands in his lap as he
looked at the viewscreen, the one that was showing NIGHTSHIFT walking
towards CRYONOSIS again and venturing inside.

ELDER muted the conversation so that NIGHTSHIFT wouldn't be destracted
with their conversation. "So tell me Windlord and Perceptor, what
wopuld you suggest?

He turned to look at both of them, "You have a good understanding of
the situation. If we send in more troops to help Tuscon then we risk
loosing them." ELDER shrugged, "As if we have more troops to loose."

(TAG)

- Preston
